title: Trump says ceasefire not at risk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says the ceasefire deal is not at risk even after Israeli airstrikes hit Gaza, killing scores of people.

title: Trump says South Korea 'pretty much finalized' trade deal with US
shortDescription: Trump called a pending trade deal with South Korea 'pretty much finalized' after months of deadlock over details of investment in the US.

title: Trump given gold crown in South Korea
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was presented with a gold crown during his trip to South Korea.

title: Trump says it's 'pretty clear' he can't seek a third term
shortDescription: "I would say that if you read it, it’s pretty clear, I’m not allowed to run," Trump said about the possibility of third term. "It’s too bad."

title: Trump gets gold crown and South Korea’s highest honor
shortDescription: Trump was presented with a replica of an ancient gold crown as well as a medal representing the highest state honor during his visit to South Korea.

title: White House fires arts advisers as Trump's $300M ballroom plans whirl
shortDescription: The commission is charged with giving expert advice to the president, Congress and the heads of departments on matters of design and aesthetics.

title: Trump approval remains steady despite shutdown woes, poll finds
shortDescription: The president's approval rating has plateaued in Reuters/Ipsos polling since May, as respondents express 'frustration' and 'anger' over the shutdown.

title: Mike Johnson addresses Trump's 'third' term
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson reflected on the constrictions of the Constitution regarding Donald Trump seeking a third presidential term.

title: Chicago judge rips Trump enforcer over tear-gassing trick-or-treaters
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Sara L. Ellis called Border Patrol Cmdr. Gregory Bovino into court to respond to reports that his agents violated her orders.

title: Israeli planes strike Gaza in test of Trump-brokered ceasefire
shortDescription: An Israeli military official told Reuters Hamas violated the ceasefire with an attack against Israeli forces in an area under Israeli control.

title: Trump continues toying with third term, despite Constitutional ban
shortDescription: President Donald Trump made comments about running in 2028, but he is barred from being elected to a third term.

title: States SNAP back: Trump administration sued over food aid cutoff
shortDescription: A coalition of states filed a lawsuit to stop the Trump administration from suspending food aid benefits amid the ongoing government shutdown.

title: GOP committee urges DOJ investigate all of Biden's executive actions
shortDescription: The GOP-led report claims the former president's use of the autopen, which goes back decades, makes his executive actions 'void,' urging the DOJ step in.

title: Trump slams 'politically charged prosecution' in hush money appeal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump argued in an appeal of his 2024 criminal conviction that the verdict rested on a series of "fatal flaws."

title: Trump understands he can't run again, Mike Johnson says
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson said Tuesday he doesn't believe President Donald Trump has any real inclination to attempt to run for a third term.

title: Watch VA, NJ, CA now for clues to the midterms and 2028. (Maybe.)
shortDescription: There's a reason the political world is obsessed with the Nov. 4 gubernatorial races in Virginia and New Jersey: They're the only ones we've got.

title: NYC voters hit polls early
shortDescription: Early voting is underway in New York City as residents choose their next mayor.

title: 'More than the National Guard.' Trump warns of deploying more troops
shortDescription: Trump warned in a speech in Japan that he could send 'more than the National Guard' to quell what he contends is rampant violence in US cities.

title: Trump visits US troops in Japan
shortDescription: President Donald Trump praised Japan’s first female prime minister during his trip. The leaders signed a minerals deal and spoke to troops.

title: Leader of local GOP in Kentucky apologizes for sharing racist video depicting Obamas
shortDescription: The Kentucky Republican Party said it is investigating the matter "and will take the harshest action available to us against those involved."

title: A strong handshake and another Nobel Prize nod for Trump in Japan
shortDescription: Trump's visit to Japan to meet the new prime minister gave him another supporter for the Nobel Peace Prize.
